content:
# The furnace is operational and currently has 9 iron ore left, with 4 coal remaining as fuel. 
# However, it seems that no iron plates have been produced yet. This could be due to the smelting process taking some time.

# 18. **Monitor the furnace for production.**
# I will wait a moment to see if the furnace completes the smelting process and produces any iron plates.

# 19. **Check the furnace status again after a short wait.**
# This will allow me to see if any iron plates have been produced.
furnace_status = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Check the furnace status again.

# 20. **Display the updated inventory and furnace status.**
print(f"Updated Furnace Status: {furnace_status}")  # Check the contents of the furnace.
print(f"Updated Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the overall inventory again.
